item,phasetype,survey,max_time,notes,condition,text,shuffle_1,task_title,task_body_text,weight, 0,uor_cover,,user,,,Welcome,,../../collector-experiments/User/Assets/MSc/cover_zoom_in.css,,, 0,task_bookend,,,-,,Start,,üë©‚Äç‚úàÔ∏è Word search üë®‚Äç‚úàÔ∏è,"

Thank you for pilot testing the task.

On the next screen you will see a grid of letters. Within that grid, there are 18 hidden words, none of which are less than 4 letters long. Words can go left-to-right, up-to-down, and diagonally, they may also share letters with another word. When you find an word, use your mouse to click and drag across the corresponding letters (a yellow block-line will appear where you drag). If you correctly identify a hidden word, the block-line will turn green and remain in place

You have 5 minutes to find as many words as you can. A sliding timer bar below the word search indicates how long you have left. If you find all the words before the time is up, the task will automatically end.

When you are ready, please press Start below to begin. Good luck!

You have 5 minutes to find as many words as you can. A sliding timer bar below the word search indicates how long you have left. If you find all the words before the time is up, the task will automatically end.

When you are ready, please press Start below to begin. Good luck!

Thank you for completing the second word search task.

On the next screen you will see another grid of letters. Within that grid, there are once again 18 hidden words, none of which are less than 4 letters long. Words can go left-to-right, up-to-down and diagonally, they may also share letters with another word. When you find an word, use your mouse to click and drag across the corresponding letters (a yellow block-line will appear where you drag). If you correctly identify a hidden word, the block-line will turn green and remain in place

You have 5 minutes to find as many words as you can. A sliding timer bar below the word search indicates how long you have left. If you find all the words before the time is up, the task will automatically end.

When you are ready, please press Start below to begin. Good luck!

Thank you. Chris",,Save your data,,üíæ Please Save Your Data üíæ,"Thank you for completing all 3 word search tasks. You now need to save your data.

Please click the button below and save the .csv file to your computer - you can rename the file if you wish.

If the button doesn't work for any reason, you can save your data by pressing Ctrl+S (Cmd+S on a Mac) too.

Thank you again for taking part. Once you have saved you data, please close your browser to exit the experiment.",,
